description: Unique identifier of the asset within the fleet system to which the recall applies.
High-level classification of the asset to determine recall applicability and for reporting.
Internal sequence number for this asset’s recall entry; likely increments to distinguish multiple recalls; confirm with SME.
Indicates whether the recall is currently active or has been closed for the asset.
Short subject line summarizing the recall issue or required action.
Detailed narrative of the recall, including scope, instructions, and any staff notes.
Timestamp when the recall was completed or administratively closed; null if still open.
User who created the recall record.
Timestamp when the recall record was created.
User who last modified the recall record.
Timestamp of the most recent update to the recall record.
Reference to supporting documents for the recall; likely a foreign key to an attachments store; confirm with SME.
NHTSA campaign number associated with the recall; may store a manufacturer program code if none exists; confirm with SME.
Manufacturer’s recall or service campaign identifier for the issue.
Date the recall notice was issued or logged for the asset, used for compliance timelines and tracking.
